vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 2 to the professional services contract with Brown & Hofmeister, L.L.P., to provide additional legal counsel, advice, and representation to the City of Dallas and former Dallas Police Chief Ulysha Reneé Hall in connection with the lawsuit styled Ray Jordan II et al. v. City of Dallas et al., No. 3:22-CV-1173-M - Not to exceed $75,000.00, from $100,000.00 to $175,000.00 - Financing:   Liability Reserve Fund
